Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Updated webcam performance, added dynamic image control.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size | Microphone + Webcam + LAN / Wi-Fi

English.Char_Desc_45: Free server-less video phone for LAN
English.Char_Desc_80: A professional peer-to-peer server-less video phone for LAN / Wi-Fi chatting.
English.Char_Desc_250: Sqeaker video phone is designed to be a video/voip application for use within LAN and even Wi-Fi networks. This communication's app is an ideal replacement for internet chat and video connections in companies, home networks, student campuses.
English.Char_Desc_450:
Sqeaker video phone is designed to be a video/voip application for use within LAN and even Wi-Fi networks. This communication's app is an ideal replacement for internet chat and video connections in companies, home networks, student campuses, or wherever it is needed.
It is also able to create a private and secure peer-to-peer contact which will improve internal communications, business productivity, and relationships with friends and colleagu
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Sqeaker video phone is designed to be a video/voip application for use within small, medium, and large Local Area Networks {LAN}, even Wi-Fi networks. This communication's app is an ideal replacement for internet chat and video connections in companies, home networks, student campuses, or wherever it is needed.
It is also able to create a private and secure peer-to-peer contact which will improve internal communications, business productivity, and relationships with friends and colleagues.
The smart, comfortable, and pleasant looking user interface with advanced usability options allows you to join any network in a few mouse clicks. Sqeaker video phone will allow you to video conference instantaneously from and to all other users of your network while interacting with them on your screen.
No knowledge of computers is necessary to install and use this software. Thanks to its standardised interface, its set-up is immediate and doesn't require any server or hardware configuration. Just install the software in all the computers and the program is ready to use.
How it works:
For LAN and Wi-Fi connections, simply enter the I.P. address or Host name you want to call and click on the "Chat" button. When the ringtone goes off, just answer your call and start chatting.
Recommended codecs for best video performance are - RGB 24, i420, YUV2. Please don't use any mpeg codecs as they are not supported!
Here are some key features of SSuite Sqeaker Phone:
- Server-Less - Stand-alone application - Instant Video Chat with VOIP - Instant Setup and Run with No IP Configuration - Nice Look and Feel for user friendly work environment - Select your own ring tone. {mp3, wav, and wma files supported} - Interactive Features: Video, window flashing when user calls and play sound when being called
No Java or DotNet required. Green Energy Software. Saving the planet one bit at a time...
